product_overview: AfriPOS is a comprehensive full-stack marketplace and point-of-sale platform designed for sellers to list products, manage profiles, chat with buyers, and operate in-store POS with robust online/offline capabilities, leveraging a Supabase backend.
core_goals: Enable seamless product browsing, searching, and filtering for buyers.
Allow sellers to create and manage professional profiles, business types, and product listings.
Provide a fully functional POS system capable of handling multi-order checkout with offline sync.
Implement real-time chat between buyers and sellers to facilitate communication.
Ensure data security and integrity with Supabase's Row-Level Security and reliable offline data synchronization.
Deliver analytics and dashboard views for sellers to monitor business performance.
Support rich product detail views with images, reviews, variant options, and related product suggestions.
key_features: User authentication with sign-up, sign-in, and password reset flows via Supabase Auth.
Home page with search, category navigation, product grid, and promotional CTAs.
Category pages featuring filters, search, pagination, and subcategory management.
Detailed product pages with image galleries, ratings, seller information, chat initiation, and related products.
Product creation and editing with AI-assisted description/category suggestions, image uploads, and variant handling.
Seller profile pages displaying personal info, statistics, reviews, and product inventories.
Settings panel for business type configuration, receipt customization, and location management with geolocation support.
Robust POS module supporting inventory browsing, multi-order tabs, cart management, quantity/discount editing, payment processing with splitting, and offline order queue syncing.
Real-time chat functionality with conversation auto-creation on product views and message management.
Analytic dashboards presenting sales, orders, receipt overviews, and daily metrics aggregated from backend rollups.
user_flow_summary: Visitor browses home page, searches products, applies filters, and views product details.
Visitor can initiate chat with sellers from product pages after authentication.
Sellers log in, manage their profiles, select business types, create/edit product listings using AI assistance and image uploads.
Sellers access the POS module to add products to cart, adjust quantities/discounts via numpad, process payments, and print receipts.
POS offline mode queues orders locally and syncs once network is available.
Sellers configure their settings including receipt templates and location preferences with geolocation integration.
Sellers and buyers engage in real-time chat conversations with message sending and receiving.
Analytics dashboard displays seller-specific metrics and statistics for business insights.
validation_criteria: Authentication flows correctly handle sign-up, sign-in, and password reset with proper session persistence.
Product grids on home and category pages load within 2 seconds on broadband connections.
POS interactions such as cart updates and numpad input occur with near-instant response times.
Offline POS orders queue locally and synchronize correctly after reconnecting to the network without data loss.
Row-Level Security in Supabase strictly enforces user data access permissions, preventing unauthorized data retrieval or modification.
Chat conversations are created automatically on product views and support real-time message exchange.
Product creation and editing form validates input fields and submits data successfully to Supabase with fallback support.
Settings updates persist correctly and receipt previews reflect the current configuration.
Analytics data is accurate and reflects daily rollups and current order/payment data.
Major UI components are responsive and compatible across modern desktop and mobile browsers as specified.
